titleStmt.title: The works of Mr. John Cleveland containing his poems, orations, epistles, collected into one volume, with the life of the author.
titleStmt.author: Cleveland, John, 1613-1658.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R. Holt for Obadiah Blagrave ...,

notesStmt.note: "Revised poems, orations, epistles ... " (with special t.-p.): p. [179]-384.
Dedicatory epistle signed J.L., S.D., i.e. J. Lake and S. Drake.
"Books printed for and sold by Obadiah Blagrave," 4 p. at end.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
